Verses: 1 aa, Neer En Thaayin Paalkudiththa En Sagodharanaippolirundheeraanaal, Naan Ummai Veliyile Sandhiththu Muththamiduven; Ennai Nindhikkavumaattaargal.
2 naan Ummaik Koottikkondu, En Thaayin Veettukku Azhaiththukkondupoven; Neer Ennaip Podhippeer, Kandhavarkkamitta Dhraatcharasaththaiyum, En Maadhalampazharasaththaiyum Umakkuk Kudikkakkoduppen.
3 avar Idadhukai En Thalaiyin Keezhirukkum, Avar Valadhukai Ennai Anaikkum.
4 erusalemin Kumaaraththigale! Enakkup Piriyamaanavalukku Manadhaagumattum Neengal Avalai Vizhikkappannaamalum Ezhuppaamalum Irukka Ungalai Aanaiyidugiren.

5 than Nesarmel Saarndhukondu Vanaandharaththilirundhu Varugira Ival Yaar? Kichchilimaraththin Keezh Ummai Ezhuppinen; Ange Umadhu Thaai Ummaip Petraal; Ange Ummaip Petraval Vedhanaippattu Ummaip Petraal.

6 neer Ennai Umadhu Irudhayaththinmel Muththiraiyaippolavum, Umadhu Buyaththinmel Muththiraiyaippolavum Vaiththukkollum; Nesam Maranaththaippol Validhu; Nesavairaakkiyam Paadhaalaththaippol Kodidhaayirukkiradhu; Adhin Thazhal Akkiniththazhalum Adhin Juvaalai Kadum Juvaalaiyumaayirukkiradhu.

7 thiralaana Thanneergal Nesaththai Avikkamaattaadhu, Vellangalum Adhaith Thanikkamaattaadhu; Oruvan Than Veettilulla Aasthigalaiyellaam Nesaththukkaagak Koduththaalum, Adhu Mutrilum Asattaipannappadum.
8 namakku Oru Siriya Sagodhariyundu, Avalukku Sthanangalillai; Nammudaiya Sagodhariyaik Ketkumnaalil Avalukkaaga Naam Enna Seyvom?
9 aval Oru Madhilaanaal, Adhinmel Vellikkottaiyaik Kattuvom; Aval Kadhavaanaal, Kedhuruppalagaigalai Adharku Inaippom.
10 naan Madhildhaan, En Sthanangal Koburangal; Avarudaiya Kangalil Kadaatchamperalaanen.
11 paagaal Aamonile Saalomonukku Oru Dhraatchaththottam Undaayirundhadhu, Andhath Thottaththaik Kaavalaaligal Vasaththile Adhin Palanukkaaga, Ovvoruvan Aayiram Vellikkaasu Konduvarumpadi Vittaar.
12 en Dhraatchaththottam Enakku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu; Saalomone! Umakku Andha Aayiramum, Adhin Kaniyaik Kaakkiravargalukku Irunoorum Serum.
13 thottangalil Vaasampannugiravale! Thozhar Un Saththaththaik Ketkiraargal; Naanum Adhaik Ketkattum.
14 en Nesare! Theeviriyum, Kandhavarkkangalin Malaigalmelulla Velimaanukkum Maraigalin Kuttikkum Samaanamaayirum.
